variants.Description in input context: The literature references 'single point mutations and gene duplication/triplication' associated with early-onset familial Parkinson's disease but does not specify exact variant details.

Material used.Material Name: Small unilamellar vesicles (SUVs), membrane and lipid mimics
Material used.Description: The study investigates α-synuclein folding using 'small unilamellar vesicles (SUVs), and membrane and lipid mimics' as described in the text.

Readout description.Result Description: The smFRET study demonstrates that α-synuclein undergoes conformational changes upon binding to membranes, but no specific variants are analyzed in this context.
